document.discussion_title: Marijuana Dispensaries Surge Prompts Call For Regulation From Municipalities
document.topic_text: HuffPost Canada Monday 25th April, 2016 TORONTO -- A recent spike in the number of storefront marijuana dispensaries in parts of the country is prompting calls for the government to regulate an area not covered by current legislation.The Canadian Association of Medical Cannabis Dispensaries estimates there are at least 350 such storefronts in Canada, with dozens opening in Toronto alone in the past few months.Opponents say the?storefront dispensaries?are technically illegal and should be?closed immediately....
document.post: HuffPost Canada Monday 25th April, 2016 TORONTO -- A recent spike in the number of storefront marijuana dispensaries in parts of the country is prompting calls for the government to regulate an area not covered by current legislation.The Canadian Association of Medical Cannabis Dispensaries estimates there are at least 350 such storefronts in Canada, with dozens opening in Toronto alone in the past few months.Opponents say the?storefront dispensaries?are technically illegal and should be?closed immediately....
